name: The Reaper
description:
Sprite Assets Used (CC-0): https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

GitHub link : https://github.com/OldKros/The-Reaper

Move with WASD - Attack with left mouse button

A knight is exploring an Ancient dungeon where he discovers an Ancient Power.

He is stuck in a never-ending loop of being fighting countless hordes of demons from where-be-known'st. 

Using power (coins) gained from slaying these demon beings he is able to elevate his own power but only after he has fallen himself.

Known bugs:

Attack gets interrupted when you get hit,

Current WIP:

Upgrade System (i.e increase area of attack, health, damage, etc)

More weapons / variant attacks;

Character choice (i.e knight with sword / elf with bow / wizard with staff magic)

What I want to have in the game if I were to continue:

Different types of power from different enemies

Abilities / different attack styles

new layouts  / arenas
